actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."yelp_users" SET
		"user_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.user_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user_id : update_form.sourceData.user_id}}',
		"name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.name : update_form.sourceData.name}}',
    "review_count" = '{{update_form.fieldState.review_count.isVisible ? update_form.formData.review_count : update_form.sourceData.review_count}}',
		"yelping_since" = '{{update_form.fieldState.yelping_since.isVisible ? update_form.formData.yelping_since : update_form.sourceData.yelping_since}}',
		"useful" = '{{update_form.fieldState.useful.isVisible ? update_form.formData.useful : update_form.sourceData.useful}}',
		"funny" = '{{update_form.fieldState.funny.isVisible ? update_form.formData.funny : update_form.sourceData.funny}}',
		"cool" = '{{update_form.fieldState.cool.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cool : update_form.sourceData.cool}}',
		"elite" = '{{update_form.fieldState.elite.isVisible ? update_form.formData.elite : update_form.sourceData.elite}}',
		"friends" = '{{update_form.fieldState.friends.isVisible ? update_form.formData.friends : update_form.sourceData.friends}}',
		"fans" = '{{update_form.fieldState.fans.isVisible ? update_form.formData.fans : update_form.sourceData.fans}}',
		"average_stars" = '{{update_form.fieldState.average_stars.isVisible ? update_form.formData.average_stars : update_form.sourceData.average_stars}}'
	WHERE "Unnamed: 0" = {{data_table.selectedRow.Unnamed: 0}};
